summary: A documentary type film about the dates Myles has gone on as he tries to find out how to find love in the future.
cast: Myles Berkowitz|Elisabeth Wagner|Richard Arlook|Tia Carrere|Robert McKee|Elie Samaha|Tom Ardavany|Emily Arlook|Rachel Arlook|Barbara Cameron|Signy Coleman|Letitia Fox|Greg Kita|Michelle Madden|Stephanie Magid|Julie McCullough|Dominic Renda|Jeanne Ryan|Stacy Sanches|Tava Smiley|Sharon Soboil|Shal Verini|Elizabeth Wagner|Sydne Squire
title: 20 citas
